title: Philosophy of the Economy - An Aristotelian Approach - PDF
description:
Published: December 31, 2013
Language: English
ISBN-13: 978-3319026473
ISBN-10: 331902647X 
Pages: 140 pages 
Format: PDF

This book develops a philosophical analysis of economic reality and economic science from an Aristotelian point of view. It is the result of many years of thinking and philosophical study about these topics. It differs from other philosophy of economics books as it also deals with economic reality (not only the science) and approaches its subject from an Aristotelian perspective. It differs from other Aristotelian studies about economics as it covers the whole of philosophy of the economy.
